tool_input.command: source ~/.zshrc >/dev/null 2>&1 && echo "强制重新构建 wavesrv..." && cd cmd/server && CGO_ENABLED=1 GOOS=darwin GOARCH=arm64 go build -v -o ../../bin/wavesrv.arm64 . && echo "重新构建完成"

tool_response.stdout:
强制重新构建 wavesrv...
重新构建完成

tool_input.command: source ~/.zshrc >/dev/null 2>&1 && echo "复制新的wavesrv到应用包..." && cp bin/wavesrv.arm64 make/Wave.app/Contents/Resources/app/bin/ && echo "停止Wave Terminal..." && pkill -f Wave.app && sleep 3 && echo "启动修复后的Wave Terminal..." && nohup make/Wave.app/Contents/MacOS/Wave > /dev/null 2>&1 &

tool_response.stdout:
复制新的wavesrv到应用包...
cp: directory make/Wave.app/Contents/Resources/app/bin does not exist
